item.name: Common
item.description: common language shared by all races

item.name: Slashing
item.description: Slashing damage from a bladed weapon

item.name: Piercing
item.description: Piercing damage from a pointed weapon

item.name: Weapon
item.description: Item designed and constructed to do damage in combat

item.name: Armor
item.description: Item designed to protect the wearer from damage in combat

item.name: General Feats
item.description: Common feats usable by all characters

item.name: Fear Resistance
item.description: You have +2 will against fear and charm magic, effects and abilities.

item.name: Heal Self
item.description: Once per day, you may spend a full-turn action to heal a number of HP equal to your level.

item.name: Hold Breath
item.description: You can hold your breath up to three times longer than normal.

item.name: Dark Vision
item.description: You can see in no illumination environments as if they were partial illumination, up to 6 spaces away. You cannot see color when using dark vision.

item.name: Heat Vision
item.description: You can see bodies of heat in no illumination and partial illumination environments, up to 6 spaces away. Heat vision cannot be used to detect cold blooded characters.

item.name: Amphibious
item.description: You can breath under water up to x5 longer than you would normally be able to hold your breath.

item.name: Blindsight
item.description: Through echolocation, smell, vibrations, magic or other extraordinary senses, you can sense the location of objects and characters up to 3 spaces away (whether or not you have normal sight). You cannot discern colors or read words with blindsight. Blindsight is not affected by light-based attacks but may be vulnerable to sound-based attacks if you rely on sound to use blindsight.

item.name: Bleed
item.description: Once per minute make a fortitude save for every bleed counter you have. If successful, remove 1 bleed counter. If failed, suffer -1.

item.name: Blind / Partial Blind
item.description: You suffer -4 to attack and defense for as long as you are blind. However, if you're only partial blind you suffer -2 to attack and defense, instead.

item.name: Acid
item.description: Once per turn the defender suffers -2d6. A random wood, leather or cloth item (GM's choice) that has touched the acid is destroyed.

item.name: Age
item.description: The defender permanently ages 1d6 x 10 years.

item.name: Charge
item.description: If the attacker moved in a straight line at least 4 spaces this turn then immediately makes a melee attack, the defender must make a reflex save: If failed, all damage suffered from that attack is doubled.
